## Progress Summary

Project scaffolded with TypeScript/Node.js CLI structure including:
- API client wrappers for Discogs and SoundCloud
- SQLite database for local caching
- CLI commands for sync, list, stats, and playlist creation
- Type definitions and service layer
- Test framework (Jest) and build configuration
